effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of those hit.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of those hit.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of those hit.
